name: Gardenscapes
description:
Accept your inheritance and leave the gray city life behind â€“ escape to the countryside!

But ... what on earth? Your grandfather's once beautiful garden has decayed. And you don't have any money. His old house's many rooms are crammed with all sorts of odds and ends, though. So you get to work, selling the stuff.

News of your project spreads fast, and soon it's even in the paper.

Will you manage to restore the garden to its original splendor?

The chart topper - now for Nintendo 3DS
Exclusive, gorgeous 3D garden
Hidden objects + building strategy
Lovingly drawn with elaborate animation
disclaimer: You may need an additional compatible SD card or SDHC card with available space to download this software. Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
